nodes.text: Ilyenno was a male Mirialan who was the host of Cloud City's finest luxury resort. Due to his line of work, he was very well-connected, knowing every person of importance in the entire Bespin system.
Several months into the blockade of the Anoat sector by the Galactic Empire, Ilyenno joined the crew of the Smuggler, who sent the Mirialan socialite on a variety of missions across the sector.
